motivation.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
motivation.author: Tony Robbins

motivation.text: Get busy living or get busy dying.
motivation.author: Stephen King

motivation.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivation.author: Sam Levenson

motivation.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

life.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
life.author: Mae West

life.text: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
life.author: Sarah Louise Delany

wisdom.text: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn't take.
wisdom.author: Lewis Carroll

wisdom.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
wisdom.author: Helen Keller

wisdom.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

success.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
success.author: Walt Disney

success.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau
